title: Sketch the Graph

title: Revolve the Region About the x-axis
text: Next, revolve the region around the x-axis, as shown in the following figure.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Formula for Area of the Circle
text: Since the solid was formed by revolving the region around the x-axis, the cross-sections are circles. The area of the cross-section, then, is the area of a circle, and the radius of the circle is given by f(x). Use the formula for the area of the circle: $$A(x)=\pi r^2=\pi {f{\left(x\right)}}^2=\pi {\left(x^2-4x+5\right)}^2$$
